languages.text: "Техножрец питает к чему-то неметаллическому теплые чувства? Я скорее поверю, что наш проктор просто очень продвинутая модель боевого сервитора!"

traits.locale_text: "Техножрец питает к чему-то неметаллическому теплые чувства? Я скорее поверю, что наш проктор просто очень продвинутая модель боевого сервитора!"

languages.text: "A Tech-Priest being sentimental about something that isn't made solely of metal? You would have an easier time convincing me that our Proctor is actually a very advanced combat servitor model!"
languages.original_text: "Техножрец питает к чему-то неметаллическому теплые чувства? Я скорее поверю, что наш проктор просто очень продвинутая модель боевого сервитора!"

traits.locale_text: "A Tech-Priest holding sentiment about something that isn't made solely of metal? You would have an easier time convincing me that our Proctor is actually a very advanced combat servitor model!"

"A Tech-Priest being sentimental about something that isn't made solely of metal? You would have an easier time convincing me that our Proctor is actually a very advanced combat servitor model!"

languages.text: 「金属だけでできてるわけじゃない上に、感傷的になる技術司祭？それを信じろって言うくらいなら、アタシたちの代理人が実は超高性能な戦闘サーヴィターだって言われた方がまだ納得できるわ！」
languages.original_text: "A Tech-Priest being sentimental about something that isn't made solely of metal? You would have an easier time convincing me that our Proctor is actually a very advanced combat servitor model!"

traits.locale_text: 「金属だけでできてるわけじゃない上に、感傷的になる技術司祭？それを信じろって言うくらいなら、アタシたちの代理人が実は超高性能な戦闘サーヴィターだって言われた方がまだ納得できるわ！」

languages.text: "Ein Techpriester zeigt Sentimentalität wegen etwas, das nicht ausschließlich aus Metall besteht? Da überzeugt Ihr mich noch eher davon, dass unser Proktor in Wahrheit ein fortschrittlicher Kampfservitor ist!"
languages.original_text: "A Tech-Priest being sentimental about something that isn't made solely of metal? You would have an easier time convincing me that our Proctor is actually a very advanced combat servitor model!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Techpriester zeigt Sentimentalität wegen etwas, das nicht ausschließlich aus Metall besteht? Da überzeugt Ihr mich noch eher davon, dass unser Proktor in Wahrheit ein fortschrittlicher Kampfservitor ist!"

languages.text: « Un technoprêtre qui se laisse aller à la sentimentalité pour quelque chose qui n'est pas entièrement fait de métal ? Il serait plus facile de me convaincre que notre proctor est en réalité un servitor de combat très sophistiqué ! »
languages.original_text: "A Tech-Priest being sentimental about something that isn't made solely of metal? You would have an easier time convincing me that our Proctor is actually a very advanced combat servitor model!"

traits.locale_text: « Un technoprêtre qui se laisse aller à la sentimentalité pour quelque chose qui n'est pas entièrement fait de métal ? Il serait plus facile de me convaincre que notre proctor est en réalité un servitor de combat très sophistiqué ! »

languages.text: «¿Un tecnosacerdote poniéndose sentimental por algo que no está hecho de metal? ¡Antes me creería que nuestro Procurador es en realidad un modelo muy avanzado de servidor de combate!».
languages.original_text: "A Tech-Priest being sentimental about something that isn't made solely of metal? You would have an easier time convincing me that our Proctor is actually a very advanced combat servitor model!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Un tecnosacerdote poniéndose sentimental por algo que no está hecho de metal? ¡Antes me creería que nuestro Procurador es en realidad un modelo muy avanzado de servidor de combate!».

languages.text: “我们的监察官明明不完全是金属做的，可那个技术神甫居然和他感情这么好？这不禁让我怀疑，我们这位监察官其实说不定是某种非常先进的战斗机仆！”
languages.original_text: "A Tech-Priest being sentimental about something that isn't made solely of metal? You would have an easier time convincing me that our Proctor is actually a very advanced combat servitor model!"

traits.locale_text: “我们的监察官明明不完全是金属做的，可那个技术神甫居然和他感情这么好？这不禁让我怀疑，我们这位监察官其实说不定是某种非常先进的战斗机仆！”

languages.text: "Metalden ibaret olmayan bir şeye üzülen bir Tekno Rahip... Üsteğmen'in üst düzey bir çatışma hizmetörü modeli olduğunu söylesen daha az şaşırırdım!"
languages.original_text: "A Tech-Priest being sentimental about something that isn't made solely of metal? You would have an easier time convincing me that our Proctor is actually a very advanced combat servitor model!"

traits.locale_text: "Metalden ibaret olmayan bir şeye üzülen bir Tekno Rahip... Üsteğmen'in üst düzey bir çatışma hizmetörü modeli olduğunu söylesen daha az şaşırırdım!"

languages.original_text: "A Tech-Priest being sentimental about something that isn't made solely of metal? You would have an easier time convincing me that our Proctor is actually a very advanced combat servitor model!"
